entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with ice pellets in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm over southern sections. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain before morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
